metadata.name: Through Heaven's Eyes
metadata.description:
if i could see my life through heaven's eyes,
all the beauty that surrounds me.
look at me as God sees me,
perfect and whole.
the stars above, the earth below,
the love that always abounds me.
i would cherish every moment,
and never lose my light.
if i could see my life through heaven's eyes,
i would live every day with delight.
